recommendations.reason: This biotechnology stock shows massive insider conviction with over $66 million in purchases detected recently, including a significant buy by a director. The stock is currently breaking out, up 7.5% intraday and 18.5% over the last 5 days, confirming strong momentum. Although RSI is overbought, the confluence of high-volume insider accumulation and a bullish MACD crossover suggests a sustained move. The risk/reward is highly asymmetric to the upside given the aggressive capital commitment from insiders.
